Learn more at: https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/

title: Test
text:
I’m based in Switzerland and work on urban transformation and spatial modeling.
You can find my research on Google Scholar
and code on GitHub.

title: Yves M. Räth
text:
I’m Yves Räth, a researcher in settlement systems and spatial data analysis.
This site collects my work, methods, and projects.
